Class Board

java.lang.Object
engine.board.Board
All Implemented Interfaces:
BoardManager
public class Board extends Object implements BoardManager
Represents the game board for the Jackaroo game. Manages the track cells, safe zones, and game state initialization. Implements BoardManager to handle board-specific operations.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructs a Board object, initializing the game board with cells and safe zones.

    • Board

      public Board(ArrayList<Colour> colourOrder, GameManager gameManager)
      Constructs a Board object, initializing the game board with cells and safe zones.
      Parameters:
      colourOrder - The order of player colours for assigning safe zones.
      gameManager - The GameManager instance to manage game state.
